page.title: 13CRAMOND :Dunfermline College
page.content: Dunfermline College, a national college of Physical Education, has been in Cramond for about 20 years. In specially designed buildings with well equipped gyms and theatres and on fine playing fields, more than 3000 Further Education students have been trained to teach Physical Education or have been prepared for the British Leisure and Recreation Industry. Most of the students have been Scottish females. There have always been students from the rest of Britain and from overseas The B Ed course is still all female but the B A degree is mixed and from next year there is to be no segre- gation in the instruction of Physicakl Education. We hope that does not mean the College will move away from Cramond. We know that it can be difficult to integrate football games in our primary school.
